localised_description.last_approved_text: Removing this rival Beastlord's horns means he can never again challenge you, and in sparing his life you have earned the respect of your forces.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Removing this rival Beastlord's horns means he can never again challenge you, and in sparing his life you have earned the respect of your forces.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos Gods look upon your warriors' sacrifice extremely favourably - while your numbers may perhaps suffer, the corruption of Chaos spreads more insidiously than ever before!

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Chaos Gods look upon your warriors' sacrifice extremely favourably - while your numbers may perhaps suffer, the corruption of Chaos spreads more insidiously than ever before!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your Bray-Shaman, unable to make a pilgrimage to the Heart of the Dark, instead resolves to make the Winds of Magic blow stronger across the blood-grounds!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your Bray-Shaman, unable to make a pilgrimage to the Heart of the Dark, instead resolves to make the Winds of Magic blow stronger across the blood-grounds!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Endowed with bestial cunning, the warherds can encircle the foe and strike from unexpected directions.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Endowed with bestial cunning, the warherds can encircle the foe and strike from unexpected directions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Makes ready to capture a settlement.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Makes ready to capture a settlement.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While raiding and despoiling, Beastmen appease their Gods and gather vile spoils.

effect_bundles.localised_description: While raiding and despoiling, Beastmen appease their Gods and gather vile spoils.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Beastmen make an encampment hidden from outsiders, allowing the herds to recruit and replenish.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Beastmen make an encampment hidden from outsiders, allowing the herds to recruit and replenish.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In defeating Boris Todbringer you have learned something useful - that a brief taste of human flesh is surpassed by the unending exultation that vengeance brings.

effect_bundles.localised_description: In defeating Boris Todbringer you have learned something useful - that a brief taste of human flesh is surpassed by the unending exultation that vengeance brings.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The puny man-filth cower, seeking aid from others of their kind in a pointless attempt to prevent their inevitable downfall. When faced with the fury of the beast, such trivial actions matter not.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The puny man-filth cower, seeking aid from others of their kind in a pointless attempt to prevent their inevitable downfall. When faced with the fury of the beast, such trivial actions matter not.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wear Boris Todbringer’s eye around your neck. Let all who look upon it be reminded of the Beastmen's unrelenting desire for blood, flesh, and slaughter.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Wear Boris Todbringer’s eye around your neck. Let all who look upon it be reminded of the Beastmen's unrelenting desire for blood, flesh, and slaughter.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many human settlements lay in ruin - death and despair are rife throughout their lands. Continue on this course - seek an end to all mankind!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Many human settlements lay in ruin - death and despair are rife throughout their lands. Continue on this course - seek an end to all mankind!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Khazrak embodies the rage of the Beastmen. Hunger for war, for flesh and, most of all, for revenge drives his journey across the great blood-grounds, at the head of the brayherd.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Khazrak embodies the rage of the Beastmen. Hunger for war, for flesh and, most of all, for revenge drives his journey across the great blood-grounds, at the head of the brayherd.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Crowfather is swift, as if riding the very Winds of Magic. His every step and word boils with corruption, and the Bray-Shamans who serve him carry out their horrific work with increased fervour.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Crowfather is swift, as if riding the very Winds of Magic. His every step and word boils with corruption, and the Bray-Shamans who serve him carry out their horrific work with increased fervour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Funds are useful along the road to victory, but they do not win battles.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Funds are useful along the road to victory, but they do not win battles.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A brutish Gor - a pretender and nothing more - challenges the chieftain of the brayherd. The young-horn will pay for such folly - their horns adorning banners, and their hearts offered to the Dark Gods.

effect_bundles.localised_description: A brutish Gor - a pretender and nothing more - challenges the chieftain of the brayherd. The young-horn will pay for such folly - their horns adorning banners, and their hearts offered to the Dark Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Striding through the twisted network of beast-paths, the herds happen across an immense and ancient herdstone. Carved with mysterious runes, the stone records many forbidden and lost ways of Cloven Ones.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Striding through the twisted network of beast-paths, the herds happen across an immense and ancient herdstone. Carved with mysterious runes, the stone records many forbidden and lost ways of Cloven Ones.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ongoing slaughter draws nearby Minotaur tribes. They hunger for blood and battle.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The ongoing slaughter draws nearby Minotaur tribes. They hunger for blood and battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Granter of Savage Hate sees our warherd for a brief moment, blessing the Gors with an exceptionally ruthless gift.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Granter of Savage Hate sees our warherd for a brief moment, blessing the Gors with an exceptionally ruthless gift.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Granter of Savage Hate demands more slaughter! The Blood God imbues the warherd with a proportion of his rage.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Granter of Savage Hate demands more slaughter! The Blood God imbues the warherd with a proportion of his rage.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Centigors raid a nearby winery, bringing back barrels of suspicious liquid. The herd gathers and drinks... only to suffer a hellish hangover!

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Centigors raid a nearby winery, bringing back barrels of suspicious liquid. The herd gathers and drinks... only to suffer a hellish hangover!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Centigors raid a nearby brewery, bringing back barrels of mannish beer. The herd gathers to slake their thirst.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Centigors raid a nearby brewery, bringing back barrels of mannish beer. The herd gathers to slake their thirst.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Famine-Fiend stalks the land, emerging from the woods to leaving nothing but barren wastes and withered crops in his wake - for that is Slugtongue's curse..

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Famine-Fiend stalks the land, emerging from the woods to leaving nothing but barren wastes and withered crops in his wake - for that is Slugtongue's curse..

localised_description.last_approved_text: The harbinger comes; storms wrack the forests in its wake. The Herdstones glow with dread and the Winds of Magic grow strong.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The harbinger comes; storms wrack the forests in its wake. The Herdstones glow with dread and the Winds of Magic grow strong.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The brayherds gather around the herdstone in an orgy bloody greed - feasting on captives and the weaker runts or the herd. The Gors will be sated and healthy for some time.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The brayherds gather around the herdstone in an orgy bloody greed - feasting on captives and the weaker runts or the herd. The Gors will be sated and healthy for some time.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Giants do not make common cause with the brayherds, but if the titans are wandering close by, they join in the slaughter - tempted by snacking on Ungor!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Giants do not make common cause with the brayherds, but if the titans are wandering close by, they join in the slaughter - tempted by snacking on Ungor!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Volkmar the Grim is the head of the Cult of Sigmar and the most powerful religious leader in the Empire. He is a pious and foreboding man, utterly devoted to the destruction of Chaos in all its forms.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Karak Eight Peaks has been lost yet again to forces foul! Clan Angrund is once more dishonoured, and will be until this ancient Hold is recaptured. Until then, all Dwarfs across the Karaz Ankor will hold King Belegar personally responsible!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Recapturing Karak Eight Peaks will be no easy task, that much is certain. Another certainty is that all those joining this undertaking will require great compensation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Karak Eight Peaks is safe in Dawi hands once more and King Belegar sits once more upon its throne. Even though much of the Hold is in a state of disrepair, Clan Angrund have at least begun to regain their former glory.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Before the loss of the Eight Peaks, Belegar’s Ancestors were the Kings of the nigh-impregnable fortress for many generations. The Angrund Clan is steeped in centuries of military understanding and has a keen eye for the particulars of siege warfare. Any Hold besieged by Belegar stands little chance of holding out, as he knows precisely how to bring its defenders to their knees.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Skarsnik is a meddlesome and cunning Night Goblin, preferring to taunt and torment his opponents rather than swiftly killing them. Ever the sneakiest of his kind, he leads his forces on feints and duplicitous manoeuvres that leave his enemies bewildered, beleaguered, and - eventually - destroyed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wurrzag’s power and influence are beyond question. Those that know his abilities obey; those who do not, suffer. His retinue of Savage Orcs has vowed to stand by ‘Da Great Green Prophet’ to the end, and their strength has inspired countless other Greenskins to war in their turn. From behind his horrifying mask, Wurrzag anticipates the will of da Godz and makes their twisted desires a hideous, gore-soaked reality.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Purging the land of evil is a great thing, both for Bretonnia and indeed the wider world.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Purging the land of evil is a great thing, both for Bretonnia and indeed the wider world.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Although they are our enemies, we belong to the same race. To destroy their settlements would be villainy indeed!

effect_bundles.localised_description: The peasants fight for any scraps they can take and seem satisfied, not that anyone cares...

effect_bundles.localised_description: Our nobles take what they want, but naturally this has slowed production somewhat.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Our armies march well on full bellies, but the peasants may starve as a result. Oh well...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The army may be happy, but the land is not. Restraint is key to balance in nature.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The army may be happy, but the land is not. Restraint is key to balance in nature.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We cannot risk another outbreak, for the pox is virulent and crippling to the population.

effect_bundles.localised_description: We cannot risk another outbreak, for the pox is virulent and crippling to the population.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Such quality, such opulence is sure to improve Bretonnia's reputation.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Such quality, such opulence is sure to improve Bretonnia's reputation.

effect_bundles.localised_description: "Dear Lady, we thank thee for the fruits of the land..."

localised_description.last_approved_text: A repeat performance is very definitely in order!

effect_bundles.localised_description: A repeat performance is very definitely in order!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our cities blossom due to the efforts of artisans from abroad.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Our cities blossom due to the efforts of artisans from abroad.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Our artisans seem grateful... not that anyone cares if they're not!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Truly, a shameful act and one that will not be soon forgotten.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Truly, a shameful act and one that will not be soon forgotten.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Pride always comes before a fall. These fits of ego are becoming rather expensive!

effect_bundles.localised_description: A wonderous sight indeed, dedicated to the blessed Lady of the Lake.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The peasants heed the warning. Just as well, for the alternative is death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Bretonnian law is just and true, as are its noble judges.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Bretonnian law is just and true, as are its noble judges.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A stern warning should be sufficient to deter such behaviour.

effect_bundles.localised_description: A stern warning should be sufficient to deter such behaviour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Lady will ensure that our gifted children are schooled correctly in the use of magic.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Lady will ensure that our gifted children are schooled correctly in the use of magic.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The children will be trained in the ways of battle; they will be the finest soldiers in Bretonnia.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The children will be trained in the ways of battle; they will be the finest soldiers in Bretonnia.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Such a beautiful statue is truly inspirational to behold.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Such a beautiful statue is truly inspirational to behold.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The statue provides protection from evil, as if the Lady herself was standing watch over her flock.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The statue provides protection from evil, as if the Lady herself was standing watch over her flock.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These hunting grounds have improved the nobles' equestrian skills and made them happy.

effect_bundles.localised_description: These hunting grounds have improved the nobles' equestrian skills and made them happy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The nobles know these places well, so the hunt is over quickly - and with a favourable conclusion.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The nobles know these places well, so the hunt is over quickly - and with a favourable conclusion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Lady has granted us knowledge that will help us in the future.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The Lady has granted us knowledge that will help us in the future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Rejoice! We have been granted the Blessing of the Lady.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Rejoice! We have been granted the Blessing of the Lady.

localised_description.last_approved_text: On this occasion, a letter; next time, the lance.

effect_bundles.localised_description: On this occasion, a letter; next time, the lance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Their meaningless words are but idle chatter, and should be ignored.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Their meaningless words are but idle chatter, and should be ignored.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We cannot risk another smallpox outbreak - the peasant population is getting too low!

effect_bundles.localised_description: We cannot risk another smallpox outbreak - the peasant population is getting too low!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Smallpox has devastated some of our villages. Who will plough the fields?

effect_bundles.localised_description: Smallpox has devastated some of our villages. Who will plough the fields?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beautiful churches and breathtaking tournament grounds can now be built.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Beautiful churches and breathtaking tournament grounds can now be built.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The epidemic may reoccur and the enemy may attack at any time. Be watchful.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The epidemic may reoccur and the enemy may attack at any time. Be watchful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The peculiar hue covering our lands spreads fear and disorder among the dull and stupid peasants.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The peculiar hue covering our lands spreads fear and disorder among the dull and stupid peasants.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The most beautiful buildings in the land! The flower of Bretonnian architecture.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The most beautiful buildings in the land! The flower of Bretonnian architecture.

localised_description.last_approved_text: All battles fought by Bretonnians are glorious by their very nature.

effect_bundles.localised_description: All battles fought by Bretonnians are glorious by their very nature.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A lot of food was lost during the witchhunt. Oh well, it is only the peasants that will starve...

effect_bundles.localised_description: A lot of food was lost during the witchhunt. Oh well, it is only the peasants that will starve...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The army is exhausted, almost as if their energy was drained by magical means...

effect_bundles.localised_description: The army is exhausted, almost as if their energy was drained by magical means...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Winds of Magic shift and grow, becoming powerful enough to be observed. Howling just beyond hearing, they cannot be heard, but can be perceived. The Chalice of Potions glows with a brighter aura, and all those who see it know its power. The Fay Enchantress wonders if this will be enough...
